New Records: Zach Neto joined the 20-20 club with his 20th home run, paired with 23 stolen bases, becoming the first Angels infielder in franchise history to produce a 20-20 season
Key Match Events: Spencer Torkelson struck out swinging against Ben Joyce with the bases loaded in the eighth inning
The Tigers finished 0-for-8 with runners in scoring position
Post-Match Reflections: Manager A.J. Hinch said of Joyce, when asked about the key moment with Torkelson, "He throws a billion. He's at the back end because of the velocity and his mentality and his aggressiveness. It's a tough matchup for anybody."
Miscellaneous Highlights: There are 27 games remaining in the season for the Tigers
The Tigers are five games back of the third and final spot in the American League wild-card race
Others: Manager A.J. Hinch praised McKinstry, who extended his hitting streak to a career-best nine games, finishing 3-for-4 with two singles, a double and a strikeout
